attributes.action: Violence against Rohingya Muslims in Myanmar
attributes.additional_details:
Amnesty International’s report on “litany of human rights violations” by the Myanmar Army sadly shows military firing on villagers  gunships, burning countless homes, arbitrary arrests, and raping women and girls. A recent Human Rights Watch report shows high definition satellite imagery of burnt and destroyed Rohingya villages.

Please call for an immediate end to the violence against an already persecuted religious minority. Also prevent further violations of the Rohingya’s human rights.
attributes.background:
There are credible reports of violence against Rohingya Muslims in Myanmar on the UK television and radio.
People are fleeing their homes, whole villages are being burnt, indiscriminate killings, tortures, rape and sexual assault of Rohingya Muslims and the destruction of mosques and homes.
